designScenario.name: Generator System
designScenario.description: Design a high-reliability Generator System to produce and condition electrical power for aircraft subsystems, ensuring seamless integration with the Electrical Power System. The system must maintain stable power generation under variable engine speeds, extreme altitudes, and transient loads while adhering to aviation safety standards.

details.description: Generate 3-phase AC power from engine-driven generators or auxiliary power units (APUs).
Provide automatic voltage regulation (AVR) to maintain output within ±1% of nominal voltage.
Deliver 90 kVA continuous power output per generator channel at 115V AC, 400 Hz.
Maintain <3% total harmonic distortion (THD) under full load conditions.
Implement differential current protection to detect and isolate ground faults.
Include overfrequency/underfrequency protection to prevent generator overspeed damage.
Operate reliably in altitudes up to 50,000 ft with -55°C to +70°C ambient temperature.
Meet 2000-hour mean time between failures (MTBF) for critical subassemblies.

systemComponents.name: Main Generator Unit
systemComponents.description: Engine-driven permanent magnet generator producing primary aircraft power, comparable to integrated drive generators (IDGs) in modern turbofans.

subComponents.name: Rotor Assembly
subComponents.description: High-speed rotating component with rare-earth magnets for electromagnetic induction.

subComponents.name: Stator Windings
subComponents.description: Stationary copper coil assembly generating 3-phase AC output.

systemComponents.name: APU Generator
systemComponents.description: Auxiliary power unit generator providing ground/emergency power, analogous to aircraft APU bleed-air systems.

subComponents.name: Starter-Generator
subComponents.description: Dual-function unit enabling APU start-up and power generation modes.

subComponents.name: Fuel Control Unit
subComponents.description: Hydro-mechanical regulator maintaining APU RPM within operational limits.

systemComponents.name: Voltage Regulation Unit
systemComponents.description: Solid-state automatic voltage regulator maintaining output stability despite engine speed variations.

subComponents.name: Excitation Controller
subComponents.description: Adjusts field current to maintain constant generator output voltage.

subComponents.name: Harmonic Filter
subComponents.description: Passive LC filter network reducing waveform distortion.

systemComponents.name: Generator Control Unit (GCU)
systemComponents.description: Digital control module monitoring generator health and implementing protective functions.

subComponents.name: Fault Detection Processor
subComponents.description: Dual-channel FPGA analyzing current/voltage signatures for anomaly detection.

subComponents.name: Load Shedding Circuit
subComponents.description: Prioritizes power distribution during under-voltage conditions.

systemComponents.name: Cooling System
systemComponents.description: Air-oil heat exchanger maintaining generator temperatures within limits, similar to aircraft bleed air cooling architectures.

subComponents.name: Oil Circulation Pump
subComponents.description: Positive displacement pump providing forced lubrication/cooling.

subComponents.name: Heat Exchanger Core
subComponents.description: Aluminum finned-tube radiator dissipating generator heat.

relationships.description: Mechanically coupled to the aircraft engine via constant speed drive (CSD) for torque conversion.
Synchronizes with primary generators during cross-bus power transfers.
Collects real-time voltage/current data from AVR sensors for closed-loop control.
Integrated cooling jacket forms structural part of generator housing.
Feeds conditioned AC power to the central electrical bus for distribution.

attributes.name: outputVoltage
attributes.description: Regulated 3-phase output voltage compliant with MIL-STD-704F.

attributes.name: frequencyStability
attributes.description: Maintained output frequency critical for avionics timing systems.

attributes.name: powerDensity
attributes.description: Power-to-weight ratio optimized for aerospace applications.

attributes.name: vibrationTolerance
attributes.description: Withstands engine-induced vibrations per DO-160 Section 8.

comments.body: Enhanced generator system with MIL-STD-704F compliance and DO-160 environmental qualifications
Dual-channel FPGA implements differential current protection and frequency monitoring
